name: Earl Grey Comfort
description: A soothing black tea with bergamot aroma, perfect for quiet moments and rainy afternoons.

name: Matcha Sunrise
description: Vibrant green matcha whisked to a smooth froth — earthy energy for a mindful start.

name: Chamomile Dream
description: Gentle chamomile blossoms steeped in honey — your invitation to unwind and drift.

name: Espresso Ignite
description: Pure, dark espresso — bold intensity in a small cup, made to spark your inner fire.

name: Iced Vanilla Breeze
description: Chilled espresso with vanilla and cream — smooth refreshment on warm, lazy days.

name: Caramel Whisper Latte
description: Velvety milk and caramel swirl through espresso — the flavor of comfort and quiet joy.

name: Negroni Ember
description: Classic Negroni with a smoky twist — bittersweet sophistication that burns slow and deep.

name: Citrus Spark Mojito
description: Mint, lime, and sparkling zest — a rush of freshness for days that demand sunshine.

name: Whiskey Glow
description: Honey, lemon, and warm whiskey — a golden hug when the world feels cold.

name: Cold Brew Focus
description: Smooth, slow-steeped cold brew that keeps your mind sharp and your pulse steady.

name: Berry Hibiscus Chill
description: Tart hibiscus and wild berries over ice — juicy, floral, and delightfully vibrant.

name: Midnight Espresso Martini
description: A dark, silky cocktail that fuses espresso with vodka — elegant energy for long nights.
